attributes.action: Change the speed limit on Kingsway to 30mph
attributes.background: Kingsway is the main road from Manchester city centre to stockport and the amount of cars I see speeding up to 80mph is absolutely disgusting especially as most of the road is a built up area. There is a accident almost everyday. Please help me make this a 30mph zone

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. 

The speed limit on Kingsway in Greater Manchester is the responsibility of Greater Manchester Combined Authority and Transport for Greater Manchester. 

You can contact Transport for Greater Manchester here: 

customer.relations@tfgm.com

You can contact the Mayor of Greater Manchester here:

the.mayor@greatermanchester-ca.gov.uk
